Author: Alright#0419
Content: Can someone explain the 51% refund thing to me please?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so if it deadlocks you can ctrl-C and see where it was stuck

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: if same entropy tx is used, it allows to cheat

Author: Alright#0419
Content: if dicefinish tx is reorged it defaults to refund?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so if it is detected, it is refunded

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: entropy is a single reveal basis

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: once you see the entropy, you can just calculate a winning player entropy at whatever odds

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so refund is the only sane thing to do, as it is possible that without any evil intent you choose the same entropy tx that was already selected by somebody else

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: of course you can also do it with evil intent, but only the first one that is dicefinished is valid, the rest are refunded

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: at least that is what it is supposed to do

Author: Alright#0419
Content: and if that valid one is reorged no other bets can use that entropy?

Author: Alright#0419
Content: they just refund?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: yes

Author: Alright#0419
Content: I have 10000 KMDICE I will give for marketing bounties if anyone has the time to set some up

Author: Alright#0419
Content: @FishyGuts ?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: dealer node tracks all entropy tx that is used, doesnt matter if only in mempool or confirmed then reorged

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it is really quite clever way to avoid this attack

Content: can dealer choose to refund at any point?
